mapper.select: select *, m.id matchingId from reservation_tb r left join team_tb t on r.user_id = t.id left join space_tb s on r.space_id = s.id left join space_pic_tb sp on s.id = sp.space_id left join matching_tb m on r.id = m.reservation_id where r.matching = true

select * from reservation_tb r join user_tb u on r.user_id = u.id join space_tb s on r.space_id = s.id join space_pic_tb sp on sp.space_id = s.id join reservation_time_tb rt on r.reservation_time_id = rt.id where u.id = #{id}
select space_id, space_name, space_location, space_pic, price, biz_start_time, biz_end_time, capacity from space_tb as space join space_pic_tb as pic on space.id= pic.space_id where space.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation_tb(reservation_number, reservation_date, personnel, to_host, status, matching, user_id, space_id, reservation_time_id, created_at) values (#{reservationNumber}, #{reservationDate}, #{personnel}, #{toHost}, #{status}, #{matching}, #{userId}, #{spaceId}, #{reservationTimeId}, now());
